QuestData.Title: Scheduled Pickup
QuestData.Description: You've proven yourself more than capable in battle, $n. As you know, there may be Shadow Council forces anywhere around Auchindoun, including near Telmor.$B$BTuulani's powers as a soulpriest have not yet fully manifested; she isn't capable of protecting the shard alone. I need you to join her at Telmor to make sure the crystal makes it to Auchindoun safely.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Soulbinder Tuulani outside Telmor.
QuestData.RewardText: It's not safe here. The Shadow Council has already taken the city!
